citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55p on
29-Mar-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility. A minor child advised that the licensees were not available. ACI Bartels texted
the licensees and both were unavailable to return to the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:55p on
29-Mar-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility.  A minor child advised that the licensees were not available.  ACI Bartels texted
the licensees and both were unavailable to return to the facility.
